relevant_findings.general: No acute distress, alert and oriented x3
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm with no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally with no crackles, rales, or wheezes
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, nontender, nondistended; incisions clean, dry, and intact
relevant_findings.drainage: Jackson-Pratt with bilious drainage; right percutaneous transhepatic biliary drainage with bilious drainage
